name: solid-stream-aggregator
description: Aggregation on top of streams generated from a Solid Pod

scripts.start-solid-server: cd scripts && rm -rf data/.internal/accounts && npx community-solid-server --config ./pod/config/unsafe.json -f ./data/ --seededPodConfigJson ./pod/pod_credentials.json
scripts.start-solid-server-extended-lock: cd scripts && rm -rf data/.internal/ && npx community-solid-server --config ./pod/config/extendedlock.json -f ./data/ --seededPodConfigJson ./pod/pod_credentials.json
scripts.test-run: cd scripts && rm -rf data/.internal/ && npx community-solid-server --config ./pod/config/auth.json -f ./data/ --seededPodConfigJson ./pod/pod_credentials.json --workers 1

author: Kushagra Singh Bisen
